name: Lug Tanks
description:
Description:

This arcade online game is a clone of the game "Tanki Online". The game has 3 tank heads and 3 tank corps.

There is a rank system and a level system.

Combine tank corps with different weapons and dominate. Get experience for kills and raise the rank.

Controls: WASD - Move Camera - Mouse or Arrows Delete - Suicide ESC - Menu LMB - Shoot Other:

Other page: https://gamejolt.com/games/LT/627862
